gramGrp.pos:
COUNT N
or
UNCOUNT N
with
SUPP

sense.def:
A particular kind of thing
je eden od razredov ali vrst določene stvari.

seg.quote: Was he carrying a weapon and, if so, what kind of weapon?
These thoughts weren't the kind he could share with anyone.

sense.def:
Kdor je
kind
, je ljubezniv, skrben in pripravljen pomagati.

seg.quote: We were much kinder to one another after that night.
It was kind of you to come.
‘You're not to blame yourself, Smithy,’ Rick said kindly.
He spoke in a kind of sad whisper.
I felt kind of sorry for him.

sense.def:
Z izrazom
of a kind
povemo, da nekaj sicer pripada določeni vrsti stvari, vendar v resnici ni zadovoljivo.

seg.quote: A solution of a kind has been found to this problem.

sense.def:
Payment in kind
je plačilo v obliki dobrin ali uslug, ne pa v denarju.
